verses.verse: My <S%H7307>breath<s%> is <S%H2254>corrupt<s%>, my <S%H3117>days<s%> are <S%H2193>extinct<s%>, the <S%H6913>graves<s%> are ready for me. breath: or, spirit is spent
Are there not <S%H2049>mockers<s%> with me? and doth not mine <S%H5869>eye<s%> <S%H3885>continue<s%> in their <S%H4784>provocation<s%>? continue: Heb. lodge
Lay <S%H7760>down<s%> now, put me in a <S%H6148>surety<s%> with thee; who is he that will <S%H8628>strike<s%> <S%H3027>hands<s%> with me?
For thou hast <S%H6845>hid<s%> their <S%H3820>heart<s%> from <S%H7922>understanding<s%>: therefore shalt thou not <S%H7311>exalt<s%> them.
He that <S%H5046>speaketh<s%> <S%H2506>flattery<s%> to his <S%H7453>friends<s%>, even the <S%H5869>eyes<s%> of his <S%H1121>children<s%> shall <S%H3615>fail<s%>.
He hath <S%H3322>made<s%> me also a <S%H4914>byword<s%> of the <S%H5971>people<s%>; and <S%H6440>aforetime<s%> I was as a <S%H8611>tabret<s%>. aforetime: or, before them
Mine <S%H5869>eye<s%> also is <S%H3543>dim<s%> by reason of <S%H3708>sorrow<s%>, and all my <S%H3338>members<s%> are as a <S%H6738>shadow<s%>. my members: or, my thoughts
<S%H3477>Upright<s%> men shall be <S%H8074>astonied<s%> at this, and the <S%H5355>innocent<s%> shall stir <S%H5782>up<s%> himself against the <S%H2611>hypocrite<s%>.

The <S%H6662>righteous<s%> also shall <S%H270>hold<s%> on his <S%H1870>way<s%>, and he that hath <S%H2890>clean<s%> <S%H3027>hands<s%> shall <S%H3254>be<s%> stronger and <S%H555>stronger<s%>. be: Heb. add strength
<S%H199>But<s%> as for you all, do ye <S%H7725>return<s%>, and come <S%H935>now<s%>: for I cannot <S%H4672>find<s%> one <S%H2450>wise<s%> man among you.
My <S%H3117>days<s%> are <S%H5674>past<s%>, my <S%H2154>purposes<s%> are broken <S%H5423>off<s%>, even the <S%H4180>thoughts<s%> of my <S%H3824>heart<s%>. the thoughts: Heb. the possessions
They <S%H7760>change<s%> the <S%H3915>night<s%> into <S%H3117>day<s%>: the <S%H216>light<s%> is <S%H7138>short<s%> <S%H6440>because<s%> of <S%H2822>darkness<s%>. short: Heb. near
If I <S%H6960>wait<s%>, the <S%H7585>grave<s%> is mine <S%H1004>house<s%>: I have <S%H7502>made<s%> my <S%H3326>bed<s%> in the <S%H2822>darkness<s%>.
I have <S%H7121>said<s%> to <S%H7845>corruption<s%>, Thou art my <S%H1>father<s%>: to the <S%H7415>worm<s%>, Thou art my <S%H517>mother<s%>, and my <S%H269>sister<s%>. said: Heb. cried, or, called
And where is <S%H645>now<s%> my <S%H8615>hope<s%>? as for my <S%H8615>hope<s%>, who shall <S%H7789>see<s%> it?
They shall go <S%H3381>down<s%> to the <S%H905>bars<s%> of the <S%H7585>pit<s%>, when our <S%H5183>rest<s%> <S%H3162>together<s%> is in the <S%H6083>dust<s%>.
